title: Ad asset reference
description: Ad asset reference is info about the ad captured by the experience event.

@id.title: Ad ID
@id.description: Identifier of the ad asset provided by media analytics customers. Following the Ad-ID standard [https://www.ad-id.org].

xdm:creativeID.title: Ad creative ID
xdm:creativeID.description: The ID of the ad creative.

xdm:creativeURL.title: Ad creative URL
xdm:creativeURL.description: The URL of the ad creative.

dc:title.title: Ad name
dc:title.description: The friendly and human-readable name of the ad asset.

xdm:advertiser.title: Ad advertiser
xdm:advertiser.description: Company/Brand whose product is featured in the ad.

xmpDM:duration.title: Ad length or duration
xmpDM:duration.description: Length or duration of ad asset in seconds.
